title: brAhmaNanendare
sahitya:
brAhmaNanendare brahmana tiLidavanavanIga brAhmaNanO


anupallavi

  brahma bhEdavendu jagavannu kaNDavanavanIga brAhmaNanO


caraNam 1    mUgalli vAyu tumbi eLeyova avanIga brAhmaNanO 
nAgasvarana dhvani kiviyalli kELOva avanIga brAhmaNanO 
bEgane nelenele Arannu aDarOva avanIga brAhmaNanO 
vEgadindali candra maNDaladamrtavanuNDava brAhmaNanO
    caraNam 2    muttinandadi maLehani uduruvAga tolagadava brAhmaNanO 
matte dvidaLada simhAsanadalli kuLitava brAhmaNanO 
ettetta nODalu sUsubaudingaLu kANova brAhmaNanO 
uttama sahasra kamala garigeyalli sErOva brAhmaNanO
    caraNam 3    thaLathaLisuva brahmarandharave sukhavendu malaguva brAhmaNanO 
balu ravi shatakOTi shimshumAradalli sErOva brAhmaNanO 
kaliyugadali hari nAmada amrtavanuNDava brAhmaNanO 
sulabhadi purandara viTTala rAyana sErOva brAhmaNanO
